snippet: A researcher at the Prado in Spain has discovered that the museum’s copy of the Mona Lisa was painted by someone working next to Leonardo da Vinci while he created the original.
lead_paragraph: A researcher at the Prado in Spain has discovered that the museum’s copy of the Mona Lisa was painted by someone working next to Leonardo da Vinci while he created the original.

headline.seo: Not Just Another Fake Mona Lisa
headline.main: Not Just Another Fake Mona Lisa
